metadata.Title: CVE-2023-45898 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: The Linux kernel before 6.5.4 has an es1 use-after-free infs/ext4/extents_status.c, related to ext4_es_insert_extent.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
